snippet: GIANSANTI--Margaret E. (DiMartini), 64, of Denver, Colorado, passed away on February 9, 2016. Meg is survived by her loving husband of 42 years, Paul Giansanti, as well as loving friends and family members in Colorado, New York and New Jersey. Please visit HoranCares.com to share a memory of Meg. 1/3
